wordGroup: continuous miner 连续采煤机；采煤联合机
gold miner 采金人；淘金者

sentences.en: Last year, Andrea's husband, Rick, a miner in Nevada was laid off.
sentences.cn: 安德里亚的丈夫里克是内华达州的一名矿工，去年他被解雇了。

sentences.en: Coal output per miner in Tribnia is double what it was five years ago, even though no new mines have opened.
sentences.cn: 尽管没有新煤矿投产，但 Tribnia 每个矿工的煤炭产量是五年前的两倍。

sentences.en: The insect, also known as the tomato leaf miner, devastates crops by feeding on fruits and digging into and moving through stalks.
sentences.cn: 这种昆虫，也被称为番茄叶虫，通过以水果为食和在茎里挖掘与移动而破坏农作物。
